name: Doki Doki Anomaly
storyline:
Become an SCP Foundation researcher studying SCP-8008, a pair of glasses that lets you fall in love with literally anything!

Try to retain your sanity and survive your encounter with SCP-173 in the prelude to the full game.

---PERFORM EXPERIMENTS ON LIVE SCP SUBJECTS---
SCP-8008: THE NOVELTY GLASSES - A COGNITOHAZARDOUS PIECE OF EYEWEAR THAT ALLOWS THE USER TO FALL IN LOVE WITH LITERALLY ANYTHING.
BECAUSE OF YOUR COGNITIVE RESISTANCE VALUE YOU HAVE RECEIVED CLASS-5 AUTHORIZATION TO TEST THEM ON SCP-173.

[[Talk to 3 different SCP girls in intense visual novel-style dialogue sections. Make decisions that will impact the course of the story.]]

---BEWARE THE HALLUCENTATIONS---
OF THE ORIGINAL FOUR RESEARCHERS YOU ARE THE ONLY SURVIVOR. THE OTHERS WERE KILLED BY AN H2 PENCIL, A DIAMOND NECKLACE, AND A POOL NOODLE RESPECTIVELY.

[[Resist the voices in your head as you play Match-3 games in your dreams. Remember, if you don't get a high enough score, you may never wake up.]]

---YOUR CHOICES DETERMINE YOUR FATE---
THE DECISIONS YOU MAKE IN YOUR CONSCIOUS AND SUBCONSCIOUS HOURS DETERMINE THE BRANCH YOUR STORY TAKES.

[[Choose dialogue options and pick how to play the Match-3 sections to change the outcome of the story.]]
summary: A weird dating-sim where you can fall in love with the monsters from SCP lore. SCP-8008-1 IS A COGNITOHAZARDOUS DATING SIM. Do not run this software without Class-4 Authorization. If you do not know why you are seeing this warning alert your local authorities IMMEDIATELY.
